pageContent: Background: Neglected sexual side effects (NSSE) are a group of less common sexual side effects that may present after Prostate Cancer (PCa) treatment. There is currently no valid and reliable tool to identify these side effects. A modified Delphi study is an effective way of developing the content of such a screening tool.

metaData.source:
Current and future technology for minimally invasive ablation of renal cell carcinoma
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21116364/
